Key Match Events: Cody Bellinger hit a two-run home run off Walker Buehler four batters into the game.
Michael Busch added a home run among four hits and three RBIs.
The Cubs earned a 10-4 victory over the Dodgers.
Post-Match Reflections: Freddie Freeman defended Buehler, stating he thought Buehler did alright despite the numbers.
Dodgers manager Dave Roberts noted Buehler's command issues but saw positives in his performance.
Buehler acknowledged the need to perform better for the team as they approach the playoffs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs managed to score just two total runs during a three-game series against the New York Yankees the previous weekend.
